subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Similarities have linked Barry Bonds and Ken Griffey Jr. But controversy has stained only Bonds, who is still under investigation for perjury in the court case dealing with the Balco steroid scandal.
snippet: Similarities have linked Barry Bonds and Ken Griffey Jr. But controversy has stained only Bonds, who is still under investigation for perjury in the court case dealing with the Balco steroid scandal.
